import React from "react"; import { useEffect,useState } from "react"; import { deletarPromocao, getPromocoes } from "../../service/PromocaoService"; export default () => { const [promocao, setPromocao] = useState([]) useEffect(() => {getPromocoes().then((res) => setPromocao(res)).catch((erro) => console.log(erro))},[]) function deletar(id) { deletarPromocao(id).then(getPromocoes().then((res) => setPromocao(res)).then(() => window.location.reload())).catch((erro) => console.log(erro)) } return(
{promocao.map((promo) => ( ))}
Destino Local de embarque Pre√ßo Tempo de viagem Data de embarque
{promo.destino.nomeDestino} {promo.localPartida} {promo.precoPromocao} {promo.data.replace('T', ' ')}
); }
